headline: BofA lifts PANW, ZS targets, sees strong cybersecurity and network momentum
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America analyst Tal Liani said in a note on Monday that sentiment in the networking and cybersecurity sectors “should continue to support strong momentum,” as spending on AI infrastructure and enterprise security remains robust.

headline: Unified Communications (UC) Market Research and Forecasts, 2025-2034 Featuring Avaya, Cisco Systems, Microsoft, IBM, RingCentral, and 8x8
summary: Opportunities in the unified communications market include leveraging AI and IoT for enhanced communication solutions, supporting hybrid work models, and integrating advanced cloud infrastructure. Growth is fueled by remote work demand, collaboration tools for enterprises, and expanding into emerging markets with 5G. headline: Cisco AI research: AI-ready Companies Outpace Peers in the Race to Value
summary: Cisco (NASDAQ: CSCO), the worldwide leader in networking and security, today released the results from the third annual CiscoAI Readiness Index. A small but consistent group of companies — the 'Pacesetters,' about 8% of organizations surveyed in Canada, and 13% globally, for the last three years — outperform their peers across every measure of AI value, captured for the first time in Cisco's global study of over 8,000 AI leaders across 30 markets and 26 industries.

headline: Pindrop Brings Advanced AI Fraud Detection Across Communication Channels with Webex by Cisco
summary: ATLANTA, October 20, 2025--Pindrop, a global leader in voice authentication, fraud and deepfake detection, today announced a strategic partnership with Webex by Cisco, a leading provider of collaboration technologies powering customer and employee experiences, to bring Pindrop’s enterprise-grade solutions to the Webex Suite and Webex Contact Center.
